alert.note: Alert for Crowley (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 16 at 4:19PM MDT until June 16 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN OTERO...SOUTHERN CROWLEY AND EASTERN PUEBLO COUNTIES... At 419 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles west of Timpas, or 24 miles west of La Junta, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Rocky Ford and Timpas. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
